div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1278 Vouni, near anc. Marium, 1928 Burial: c. 380 B.C. (Schwabacher) Contents: 4 AV, 248 AR. With jewelry, AR bowls and AV lumps from excavations Aspendus: 1 st. Amathus: 1 fr. Citium: 10 st.; 41 fr. Idalium: 1 fr. Lapethus: 2 st.; 16 fr. Marium: 57 st.; 93 fr. Paphus: z st.; 18 fr. Unc. Cypriote mints: 6 fr. Persia: 4 darics Disposition: Nicosia 130; Stockholm 122 The Swedish Cyprus Expedition 3 (1937), pp. 292 ff , illus. Schwabacher, Opuscula Archaeologica 4 (1946), pp. 25-46, illus.; â€ NNA 1947, pp. 67-104, illus. Schlumberger, L'argent grec, p. 8, no. 11
